creator: jhenry@ccs.neu.edu
text:
It would be very convenient if the data displayed in the "Aggregate Report"
listener could be dumped out to a CSV file for importing into a spreadsheet. I
discovered by accident that you can copy and paste the table, but an automated
way to do this would be great.

Independently I made the same request to the list only a few hours after this.

I would vote for this functionality as well.
creator: jmeter@myvirtualemail.biz

text:
The same with Summary Report.
In fact this is probably a generic thing - how to save the result of a 
listener. I found the save option a bit confusing - it took some time that 
what it saves is something quite independent from the listener.
creator: ralikwen@hotmail.com

text: Save buttons were added to the Listeners
creator: sebb@apache.org
